title: David Herring a finalist for WashingtonExec Pinnacle Award
content:
Awards will be given in late November 2022. Credit: Pinnacle Awards
Awards will be given in late November 2022. Credit: Pinnacle Awards
David Herring, Chief of the Communication, Education, and Engagement Division of the Climate Program Office, has been named a finalist for a Pinnacle Award for Climate Change Executive of the Year in the government category for his leadership in facilitating the development of products and services helping American communities get the data and information they need to cope with the climate crisis.
Read more at the link below.
Click to read the full article
